meanings.definition: People or things that are not wanted or considered unpleasant.
meanings.sent1: The town tried to keep the undesirables away from the park.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood watch kept an eye out for any undesirables in the area.
meanings.sent3: The party was crashed by a group of undesirables looking for free food.
meanings.sent4: The garden was overrun with weeds, the undesirables of the plant world.
meanings.sent5: The movie theater was filled with the smell of popcorn, attracting all sorts of undesirables.

meanings.definition: A person or group of people who are considered to be undesirable or unwelcome.
meanings.sent1: The school bully was seen as one of the undesirables by the other students.
meanings.sent2: The undesirables were not allowed to enter the exclusive club.
meanings.sent3: The party was crashed by a group of undesirables looking for free food.
meanings.sent4: The unwanted guests at the party were like a swarm of undesirables.
meanings.sent5: The town square was filled with undesirables, causing chaos and disorder.
